channel.title: Building Barbershop AI on Sambhav Singh Rohatgi
channel.description: Recent content in Building Barbershop AI on Sambhav Singh Rohatgi

item.title: Week 2 - Building a toy
item.description: What happened in week 2? # Well, I was unfortunately sick for most of the week, but oh well. This week was meant for creating a toy of the product.

item.title: Week 1 - Select an idea
item.description: What is this? # This is my first week of building barbershop AI, an app to try out different hairstyles virtually. The motive of the first week was to select an idea and this is the one I landed on.
